response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value and significance for us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication to excellence. We believe it has the potential to transform your business or personal endeavors in remarkable ways.

To extend this opportunity to you, we propose a purchase price of $2,000,000. This amount reflects not only the tangible cost but also the intangible benefits and prestige associated with owning such a unique product. We are confident that this investment will yield substantial returns and contribute significantly to your success.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the offer. We are here to assist you every step of the way.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
